Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

*upgrading the ec2 model for newer and cheaper instances,using reserved instances will help with cost , reducing the total amount of traffic will help significantly, removing the elasticCache and downgrading the RDS. will decrease performance but will help with the cost
